trans-unit.source: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

trans-unit.resname: PMBS·96★ | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Name
PMBS·96★ | Glissa, the Traitor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: First strike, deathtouch Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no Thopters other than Thopter Assembly, return Thopter Assembly to its owner's hand and create five 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
